parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hydroboost system can cause a loss of braking power, leading to extended stopping distances, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: Violent shaking and vibration when applying the brakes
little to no stopping ability
smoke coming from the steering wheel
excessive heat emanating from the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the multi-function switch can cause unpredictable and sudden loss of critical vehicle functions, such as headlights, wipers, cruise control, and turn signals, which can lead to accidents or reduce visibility in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Headlights
wipers
cruise control
and turn signals malfunction or work intermittently
sudden loss of function
unpredictable behavior of vehicle systems.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition switch can cause the vehicle to stall or fail to start, leading to safety risks, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: Vehicle fails to start
vehicle stalls while driving
ignition switch feels loose or worn out
difficulty turning the key in the ignition.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly
the accelerator pedal sticks or becomes stuck
the vehicle surges forward without input from the driver
the vehicle's speed increases rapidly without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause a loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle turns in an unexpected direction
the steering wheel does not respond to input
the steering column breaks or separates
the vehicle loses steering control
the vehicle crashes into a barrier or other objects.
